login.title: Authentification window
login.information: This application is secure. Use the following accounts: login/password: root/root or support/support or guest/guest.

index.sommaire: This application proposes an approach for the development of WEB application and presents a concrete example of data management. Have fun!!!
index.techno: The technologies used by this application are:
index.techno1: Spring Boot - Facilitates the creation of JAVA/Services/REST applications.

ui.title: ScratchPad features a few UI components
ui.icon_text: Example of using external icons. FontAwesome: https://fontawesome.com. These icons can be adjusted according to your needs: https://fontawesome.com/docs/web/style/size.
ui.slot_title: Use of a SLOT inside a component.
ui.slot_text: It is possible to use a SLOT to activate a sub-component inside a main component.
ui.pdf_title: A WEB component to view a PDF.
ui.pdf_text: The creation of a WEB component (here see a PDF) requires limiting the use of a Framework in order to reduce the dependencies of your component.
